Note:
For further MSS see Allen (1927)
XAllen, Hope Emily. Writings Attributed to Richard Rolle. New York: Modern Language Association of America, 1927, 170-7.
_description: One 6-line tail-rhyme stanza in Rolle’s English Psalter (Ps. LXI)

BodHat12.First Lines:
I wate na better weleþan in my thought to
                    fele…
BodHat12.Last Lines:
…Ihesu in herte to feste& ȝerne na noþer
                    thinge
BodHat12.Editions:
Allen,  Hope Emily. 
             English Writings of Richard Rolle.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1931: 16.

OxfUni64.Transcription:
I wate na bettere weleþan in my thoght to feleþe life
                    of his lufyngof all i hold it þe bestihesu in my hert to
                    festand ȝerne nane oþere thyng
OxfUni64.Editions:
Bramley,  Henry Ramsden. 
             The Psalter, or Psalms of David and certain canticles.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1884: 215.
